### **Table II**: Summary statistics for failing samples generated by the nf-core/viralrecon pipeline.

  datatable(
    rownames = FALSE,
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10,
      scrollX = FALSE,
      scrollY = "",
      columnDefs = list(
        list(className = 'dt-left', targets = "_all")
      )
    )

  # Bars to show at a glance
  formatStyle(
    'Coverage > 10x (%)',
    background = styleColorBar(range(0,100), 'lightblue', angle = -90),
    backgroundSize = '88% 88%',
    backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
    backgroundPosition = 'left'
  )
